subtitle: Smoking is bad for you and your baby
description: Smoking is bad for you and your baby
title: Stop smoking
content:
Created by BabyCenter

to stop smoking, it will make you and your baby more healthy, and it will save you money! You could try to save your money to help pay for things that you and your baby might need.

Smoking and chewing when you are pregnant can make your baby very weak and sickly. It is also bad for your baby when you are breastfeeding. 

If you use *masheri* (herbal tooth powder) or *manjan* containing tobacco to clean your teeth, change to using a toothbrush and toothpaste instead. Tobacco can harm the health of you and your baby. 

You could ask your family to help you to stop smoking. You might let them know that smoke in the house is also bad for the baby. Maybe you could ask them to stop with you. Let them know what smoking does to the baby and then ask anyone who smokes in the house to smoke outside, now you are pregnant. 

If you smoke, start cutting down or quit. It might be hard, but it is definitely worth it for your baby. Start by cutting down small amounts every day. If you are finding it really difficult to cut down, talk to your health worker.
